price: Kandi umpe kuzavugwa neza mu bazaza nyuma.
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
